name: Tower Of Hanoi (Vedang Javdekar)
description:
This is a classic recursive programming problem visualized using raylib and c++. The recursive solver generates the moves for the stack of 3 up to 10 discs on the left-most peg, destined to go to the right-most peg.

You can find the source code here:

https://github.com/vedangasDARKNINJA/Raylib-Tower-of-Hanoi
